That’s a huge discount from the regular price, and it covers two of the most essential software tools for any PC user.

items.title: Severe flooding, aid cuts deepen hunger crisis in South Sudan: charity
items.summary: JUBA, Oct. 2 (Xinhua) -- Widespread flooding for the sixth consecutive year in South Sudan, combined with aid cuts, is aggravating the country's hunger crisis, international charity Save the Children said on Thursday. Read full story

items.title: Kenya rallies Africa to create resilient tourism
items.summary: NAIROBI, Oct. 2 (Xinhua) -- Kenyan Deputy President Kithure Kindiki on Thursday called on African countries to diversify tourism products that are sustainable and resilient to external shocks, including geopolitical uncertainties and stiff competition from other destinations. items.title: Death toll from Lassa fever outbreak hits 166 in Nigeria
items.summary: ABUJA, Oct. 2 (Xinhua) -- The death toll from the Lassa fever outbreak in Nigeria, Africa's most populous country, has risen to 166 since the beginning of this year, health authorities said Thursday, warning that delayed treatment and weak awareness are fueling the disease's spread. Read full story

Today’s deal shaves $50 off its usual going rate, bringing it close to its original launch price and making it easier on your wallet. The SteamOS-powered variant of the Legion Go is rarely discounted, and it’s now matching the lowest price we first tracked for it in July. That puts it $50 below the base Xbox handheld that’s priced at $600.
